title: Sat. 11/28: The Best Saturday Party at TaJ NYC. No Cover for Everyone | Great Birthday Packages | Hookah.
desc: Saturday November 28th, 2015    Business First Ent. & Friends Present.     BEST SATURDAY PARTY    "The #1 Saturday Night Party in NYC"  @  TAJ  II  NIGHTCLUB & LOUNGE  48 W.21st Street (5th & 6th Ave.)  Manhattan, N.Y. 10010    Doors Open @ 12p.m.-4a.m.  Early Arrival is Strongly Suggested!!!    EVERYONE IS FREE UNTIL 12:00a.m.  with Mandatory RSVP.    Groups of 5+ Ladies receive a Complimentary Bottle of Champagne with RSVP.    2 for 1 Drink Specials for Everyone until 12:00a.m.    To RSVP  Email Your Full Name, # of Guests & Phone # to:  MaCofBFEnt@gmail.com    LADIES NIGHT EACH & EVERY SATURDAY:   Complimentary Drinks for Ladies from 10p.m.-11:30p.m.     CREATE YOUR OWN PACKAGE  (VALID UNTIL 12:30AM WITH ADVANCE RESERVATIONS)    $900 Bottle Package (Includes All gratuity and tax charges)   Any 3 bottles of the following: Grey Goose, Moet Nectar Rose, Absolut or Stoli & 1 bottle of champagne with 1 flavored hookah. FREE Admission for up to 12 people all night long Express entry into the club.    $600 Bottle Package (Includes All gratuity and tax charges)   Any 2 bottles of the following: Grey Goose, Moet Nectar Rose, Absolut or Stoli & 1 bottle of champagne with 1 flavored hookah. FREE Admission for up to 8 people all night long Express entry into the club.    UPGRADE YOUR PACKAGE  Ciroc, Hennessy, Patron or Johnny Walker Black just $50 more per bottle.    Dom Perignon instead for your package just $100 more per bottle.    ADD TO YOUR PACKAGE  * A platter of hors d'oeuvres: $125 *  * A flavored hookah & a bottle of champagne: $50 *   * A dozen cake pops: $20 *     CLASSIC PACKAGES  $700 Ciroc Package (Includes All gratuity and tax charges)  2 bottles of Ciroc Vodka (any flavor).   1 bottle of champagne with 1 flavored hookah.
